entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 11:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -13.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:16 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
